## Description

A clear description of the feature or tool you'd like to see.

## Problem It Solves

What problem does this address for Denver residents or contributors?

## Proposed Solution

How you envision this working.

## Alternatives Considered

Any alternative approaches you've thought about.

## Additional Context

Any mockups, examples from other projects, or references.
